articles.author: AFP
articles.title: The Oldest Known Burial Site in The World Wasn't Created by Our Species - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Paleontologists in South Africa said they have found the oldest known burial site in the world, containing remains of a small-brained distant relative of humans previously thought incapable of complex behavior.
